Parameters: int: Position of the item in adapter.
setItemPosition(int).Description: Sets the adapter position of item to select.

Returns: The adapter position of item to select.
getItemPosition().Description: Returns the adapter position of item to select.

Returns: True for smooth scrolling to the item, false otherwise.
isSmoothScroll().Description: Returns true if smooth scrolling to the item false otherwise. By default it is true.

Returns: Optional task to run when the item is selected, null for no task.
getItemTask().Description: Returns optional task to run when the item is selected, null for no task.

Parameters: boolean: True for smooth scrolling to the item, false otherwise.
setSmoothScroll(boolean).Description: Sets smooth scrolling to the item or jump to the item without scrolling. By default it is true.

ClassDesc: A task on the ListRowPresenter.ViewHolder that can select an item by position in the HorizontalGridView and perform an optional item task on it.
